sections.text: Officers and teachers in the Americanization, evening, and summer schools may also be officers and teachers in the regular day schools.
Members of the custodial staff in the evening, summer, and Americanization schools may also be members of the custodial staff in the day schools.

chapter.text: Teachers, School Officers, and Other Employees in General.

heading.catch_text: Teachers in the Americanization schools; custodial staff.
